subtitle: Mood · Dreams · Cycle Patterns
promotional_text: Discover your emotional patterns. The journal that sees what you can't.
description:
InnerCycles is a private journal that turns your daily reflections into visible emotional patterns.

Track your moods across 5 focus areas — Energy, Focus, Emotions, Decisions, and Social — with 15 data points per entry. Over time, InnerCycles reveals cycles and correlations you never noticed.

KEY FEATURES:

• Daily Journal with 5 Focus Areas
Rate your day across energy, focus, emotions, decisions, and social interactions. Add notes and photos.

• Pattern Detection Engine
After 7 entries, your first emotional patterns emerge. See trends, correlations, and recurring cycles visualized.

• Dream Journal
12 dream categories with interpretation guidance. Track recurring dreams and correlate them with your emotional data.

• Cycle Sync
Map hormonal phases to your emotional patterns. The first journal to cross-correlate biological and emotional cycles.

• Calendar Heatmap
365-day visualization of your emotional landscape. See your year at a glance.

• Monthly & Annual Reflections
Structured reviews that surface insights from your accumulated data.

• Shadow Work Journal
Guided prompts for deeper self-exploration through acceptance, integration, and transformation phases.

• Breathing & Meditation
Built-in breathing exercises and meditation timer.

PRIVACY FIRST:
All data stays on your device. No cloud. No AI processing. Full export capability. Your journal is yours alone.

Available in English, Turkish, German, and French.
